name: Wichard
description:
This is the prototype version of Wichard, which is being developed by Xodic Studio.

If you want to get updates

Join the Xodic Studio Discord

Follow Xodic Studio on Xodic Studio | Facebook

Follow Xodic Dev On Twitter

Wichard is a real-time strategy card game about the wizard reclaiming his power.

Defeat enemies to reclaim power. The player, known as "Merlin" got lost by his own teleportation magic to this new world, and he needs to reclaim his lost power. Wichard, the real time strategy card game focus on resource management where a slight change can make a different.

The whole game can be played with left click (Drag, Click)
